entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the protagonist of the story who feels scared to see Voldemort walking along without a shield.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the antagonist of the story who is being attacked by Dumbledore's magic.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a powerful wizard who is fighting against Voldemort.

entities.name: centaur
entities.description: A one-armed centaur is being attacked by the green light and shattered into pieces.

entities.name: wall
entities.description: The wall is blocking Harry's attempt to get out.

relationships.description: Dumbledore attacks Voldemort with a long thin flame from his wand.
Voldemort is being attacked by the green light and hits the centaur.
Harry's headless guard blocks him from getting out from behind the wall.
